questions.question: The fundamental theory which could explain Photoelectric effect is

explanations.a: Classical theory failed to explain instantaneous emission and frequency dependence.
explanations.b: Correct. Quantum theory explains energy quantization and photon interaction.
explanations.c: Wave theory couldnâ€™t explain threshold frequency.
explanations.d: Corpuscular theory was outdated by the time photoelectric effect was discovered.

questions.question: Which among the following is true in the case of Photoelectric effect

answers.a: It is not an instantaneous phenomenon
answers.b: The photo current is independent of the intensity of incident light
answers.c: The kinetic energy of photo electrons increases with the frequency of incident radiation
answers.d: The photo current depends on frequency of incident radiation

explanations.c: Correct. Kinetic energy of photoelectrons is related to frequency.
explanations.d: Incorrect. Photo current depends on intensity, not frequency.

questions.question: In the experimental set up for Photoelectric effect, photo-current becomes zero when the applied voltage reaches

explanations.a: Correct. Stopping potential prevents even the most energetic electrons from reaching the anode.
explanations.b: Saturation potential gives maximum current, not zero.
explanations.c: At zero voltage, some current may still flow.
explanations.d: This is not applicable to photoelectric experiments.
